Name: Yun Jin
Title: "Stage Lucida" Yun Jin
Desc: Elegance on the stage, in decorous harmony.
Source: Reward for inviting Yun Jin to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

16072.Name: Opening Flourish
16072.Desc: Creates 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116073]</color>, attaches <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116071]</color> to this character and $[K53]: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16074]</color>.

C116073.Name: Flying Cloud Flag Formation
C116073.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

C116071.Name: Shield of Swirling Clouds
C116071.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>While preparing this Skill:</color> Grant 2 $[K6] points to the character to which this is attached.

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

C116073.Name: Flying Cloud Flag Formation
C116073.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Normal Attack:</color> If you have no more than 1 card in your Hand, this Skill costs 1 less Elemental Die.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 4 stacks)

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

16074.Name: Spear Flourish
16074.Desc: Deals $[D__KEY__DAMAGE] $[D__KEY__ELEMENT]. If you have $[K56]ed or used at least 1 card for $[K57] this Round, this deals +1 DMG.

K56.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Discard</color>
K56.Desc: Use Action Cards or Character Skill effects to Discard Action Cards from Hand or Deck.

K57.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tune</color>
K57.Desc: Discard Action Cards from Hand to initiate Elemental Tuning
